short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Flight search plugin from reliable sites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to "Flight Searcher" extension!

With Flight Searcher you'll be able to find flights more efficiently and effectively!

How? You may ask..
Just enter your desired destination and the time you want to departure, 
Our extension would quickly analyze your
inputs and filter through several "up to date valid flight databases" and list the search results for you! 
You can also organize the results by the timing, prices, set limits and...
After selecting your flight, you just have to PAY for it with ease! :)

Btw, We don't collect ANY of your interaction data. You can check that out from your browser (You just have to be a bit nerdy ðŸ˜¶) 

Thank you for SUPPORTING US,
Stay safe up there!

You can use the link below to report bugs,
give us your feedback, tell us about your ideas to improve the product or to just chat a little with us! ;)

https://zil.ink/flight_search
